Text:
Cheers for the comments.

I was getting a bit bored of seeing the effortless emulator and rom packs, which anyone could just get for themselves from countless websites, so made something a bit different.

Glad they seem to be popular.
Hi great job, but I'm wondering if there's some way to customize the controls? The ASD ZXC keys really aren't working for me!

Of course. Just press TAB. that brings up the mame menu, and you can customise the controls to your hearts content. I would reconmend changing th egeneral control settings, otherwise you will have to change it for each game.

If you have a pad, you can set the controls to that also.
Customization options are fantastic, thanks trencej
I cannot take credit for the customisation options. Thats just built into the mame emulator.
fake..just a bunch of jpegs and movie files! do not download!
so a fake then? sense i can;t even get it on disk
